body_html:
I am having the same issue on OS X Yosemite with Docker container.
In my case it should be using the CPU, I tried bumping Docker memory limit to 8GB but still getting OOM .
Looking at Docker Stats, during the final accuracy.eval() memory goes from 300MB to 900MB then it crashes.

body:
I am having the same issue on OS X Yosemite with Docker container.
In my case it should be using the CPU, I tried bumping Docker memory limit to 8GB but still getting OOM  .
Looking at Docker Stats, during the final accuracy.eval() memory goes from 300MB to 900MB then it crashes.
